REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F A RM f0332 reute r f BC-MTECH-<MTCH>-TO-OFFER 03-06 0039

TEXT.TITLE: MTECH <MTCH> TO OFFER CONVERTIBLE DEBENTURES
TEXT.BODY: MTech Corp said it expects to file shortly for an offering of subordinated debentures convertibe into common stock. It gave no details on the size of the offering. Reuter
